Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) hands out prizes to Mr. Pukhraj Jain and Mr. Jag Mohan Anand
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students, faculty members and others involved with the Institution at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of certain people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. P. Subbarayan hands out prizes to Mr. Pukhraj Jain and Mr. Jag Mohan Anand. Also seen in the image, right behind the chief guest, is Mr. Surjit S Randhava (Students Representative). Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C. V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa
